content: crochet your own lantern and staff this pattern might be difficult for beginners give it a shot and if it s too difficult come back to it after growing your skills a little more materials needed * yarn of choice in 3-4 colors - i use premier basix chenille brights * wooden dowel in size of choice - i use a 3/8 x17 5 * crochet hook that works for yarn choice and your gauge * fiber fill * scissors * stitch marker s * needle for hiding tails this pattern requires very little yarn 1 skein of each color should be enough note gauge is not important in this pattern hook size and yarn choice will determine how big it turns out
